name: phonebook_backend
description: Phonebook backend exercises for the Fullstackopen Course by the University of Helsinki

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd /home/manu/Documents/GitHub/The_FullstackOpen_Course/fullstackopen_course/part3/the_phonebook_app_part3 && npm run build --prod && cp -r build /home/manu/Documents/GitHub/The_FullstackOpen_Course/Phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: migmanu
